content:
First postHi, This is my first ever blog post. I am relearning my AI concepts including Math. I have curated a personal learning path of 12 courses with lots of research and I am planning to share all my notes as blog posts here. I belive writing in a way where I have to explain things online helps me understand many concepts better, it will also include many hands on experiment which I would have skipped otherwise.
You can alwasy reach out to me on X, I am most active there. link -> https://x.com/bruce_x_offi
Here with this first post, I want to test few things, code and Math rendering which is essential for AI ML blogs.
I will also maintain list of good quality resources.
Sample python code,
def foo(): print ('bar') lets check Math,
$$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$
title: First post of year
